duck: Consultant - A consultant (from consultare "to discuss") is a professional who provides professional or expert advice in a particular area such as security (electronic or physical), management, accountancy, ...
Cognoscenti (comics) - The Cognoscenti (Joshua Pryce, Al & “Baby Girl” Steadbaur), are fictional monster characters from the Marvel Universe who first appeared in Secret Defenders #19.
Polymath - A polymath (πολυμαθής, "having learned much"), sometimes (if male) referred to as a Renaissance man, is a person whose expertise spans a significant number of different subject areas.
Perceptual learning - Perceptual learning is the process of learning improved skills of perception.

An expert (also called cognoscente) is someone widely recognized as a reliable source of technique or skill whose faculty for judging or deciding rightly, justly, or wisely is accorded authority and status by their peers or the public in a specific well-distinguished domain.
